headline: Scott Sheffield, the Shale Boss Spurned by Exxon, Joins Fight Against Coterra
summary: Oil boss  Scott Sheffield  has a new job: activist gunslinger.  Investment firm Kimmeridge is preparing to nominate Sheffield, the former chief executive of Pioneer Natural Resources, to join  Coterra Energy  board as part of an activist push to revamp the company, according to people familiar with the matter.  It is an unexpected twist in a brewing battle over the future of Coterra, a roughly $20 billion, public oil-and-gas producer based in Houston.
